IntellisenseObjectInfo.Name: dxAction

IntellisenseObjectInfo.Name: dxCommand
IntellisenseObjectInfo.Description: A markup component used to define markup options for a command.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Indicates whether or not the widget that displays this command is disabled.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the name of the icon shown inside the widget associated with this command.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: selectionByClick
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies whether or not an item becomes selected if an end-user clicks it.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: selectionMode
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the selection mode supported by the menu.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: items
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Holds an array of menu items.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: disabled
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies whether or not the menu item is disabled.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: template
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies an item template that should be used to render this item only.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: text
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the text inserted into the item element.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: visible
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies whether or not the menu item is visible.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: beginGroup
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies whether a group separator is displayed over the item.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: closeMenuOnClick
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies if a menu is closed when a user clicks the item.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: icon
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: The name of an icon to be displayed on the menu item.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: items
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Holds an array of menu items.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: selectable
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies whether or not a user can select a menu item.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: selected
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies whether or not the item is selected.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: disabledExpr
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the name of the data source item field whose value defines whether or not the corresponding widget item is disabled.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: displayExpr
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the name of the data source item field whose value is displayed by the widget.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: itemsExpr
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the name of the data source item field that contains an array of nested items.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: selectedExpr
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the name of the data source item field whose value defines whether or not the corresponding widget items is selected.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: animation
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: An object that defines the animation options of the widget.
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Default: { show: { type: "fade", from: 0, to: 1, duration: 100 }, hide: { type: "fade", from: 1, to: 0, duration: 100 } }

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: cssClass
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the name of the CSS class associated with the menu.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: showSubmenuMode
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies options of submenu showing and hiding.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: delay
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the delay of submenu show and hiding.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: hide
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: The time span after which the submenu is hidden.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: show
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: The time span after which the submenu is shown.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: name
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the mode name.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: alternativeInvocationMode
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Holds an object that specifies options of alternative menu invocation.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: enabled
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies whether or not the standard context menu invocation (on a right mouse click or on a long tap) is disabled.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: invokingElement
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the element used to invoke the context menu.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: A Boolean value specifying whether or not the widget can respond to user interaction.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: onContentReady
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: A handler for the contentReady event.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the widget tab index.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: visible
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: A Boolean value specifying whether or not the widget is visible.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: allowColumnReordering
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies whether or not grid columns can be reordered by a user.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: allowColumnResizing
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies whether or not grid columns can be resized by a user.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: cacheEnabled
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies whether or not to enable data caching.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: cellHintEnabled
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Enables a hint that appears when a user hovers the mouse pointer over a cell with truncated content.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: columnAutoWidth
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies whether or not the width of grid columns depends on column content.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: columnChooser
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the options of a column chooser.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: emptyPanelText
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies text displayed by the column chooser panel when it does not contain any columns.
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Default: "Drag a column here to hide it"

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: enabled
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies whether a user can invoke the column chooser or not.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: height
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the height of the column chooser panel.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: title
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies text displayed in the title of the column chooser panel.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: width
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the width of the column chooser panel.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: columnFixing
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies options for column fixing.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: enabled
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Indicates if column fixing is enabled.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: texts
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Contains options that specify texts for column-fixing related commands in the column header's context menu.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: fix
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies text for a context menu item that fixes the column for which the context menu is invoked.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: leftPosition
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies text for a context menu subitem that fixes a column, for which the context menu is invoked, to the left grid edge.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: rightPosition
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies text for a context menu subitem that fixes a column, for which the context menu is invoked, to the right grid edge.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: unfix
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies text for a context menu item that unfixes the column for which the context menu is invoked.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: columns
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: An array of grid columns.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: alignment
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the content alignment within column cells.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: allowEditing
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies whether the values in a column can be edited at runtime. Setting this option makes sense only when editing is enabled for a grid.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: allowFiltering
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies whether or not a column can be used for filtering grid records. Setting this option makes sense only when the filter row and column header filtering are visible.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: allowFixing
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies whether or not the column can be anchored to a grid edge by end users. Setting this option makes sense only when the columnFixing | enabled option is set to true.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: allowGrouping
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies whether a column can be used for grouping grid records at runtime. Setting this option makes sense only when the group panel is visible.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: allowHeaderFiltering
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies whether or not to allow filtering by this column using its header.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: allowHiding
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies whether or not a column can be hidden by a user. Setting this option makes sense only when the column chooser is visible.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: allowReordering
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies whether or not a particular column can be used in column reordering. Setting this option makes sense only when the allowColumnReordering option is set to true.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: allowResizing
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies whether or not a particular column can be resized by a user. Setting this option makes sense only when the allowColumnResizing option is true.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: allowSearch
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies if a column can be used for searching grid records. Setting this option makes sense only when the search panel is visible.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: allowSorting
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies whether grid records can be sorted by a specific column at runtime. Setting this option makes sense only when the sorting mode differs from none.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: autoExpandGroup
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies whether groups appear expanded or not when records are grouped by a specific column. Setting this option makes sense only when grouping is allowed for this column.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: calculateCellValue
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies a callback function that returns a value to be displayed in a column cell.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: calculateDisplayValue
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies how to get a value to be displayed in a cell when it is not in an editing state.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: calculateFilterExpression
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies a callback function that defines filters for customary calculated grid cells.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: calculateGroupValue
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies a field name or a function that returns a field name or a value to be used for grouping column cells.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: calculateSortValue
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies a field name or a function that returns a field name or a value to be used for sorting column cells.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: caption
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies a caption for a column.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: cellTemplate
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies a custom template for grid column cells.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: cssClass
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies a CSS class to be applied to a column.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: customizeText
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies a callback function that returns the text to be displayed in the cells of a column.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: dataField
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the field of a data source that provides data for a column.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: dataType
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the required type of column values.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: editCellTemplate
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies a custom template for the cell of a grid column when it is in an editing state.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: editorOptions
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies configuration options for the editor widget of the current column.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: encodeHtml
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies whether HTML tags are displayed as plain text or applied to the values of the column.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: falseText
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: In a boolean column, replaces all false items with a specified text.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: filterOperations
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the set of available filter operations.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: filterType
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies whether to include or exclude the records with the values selected in the column's header filter.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: filterValue
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies a filter value for a column.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: filterValues
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies initial filter values for the column's header filter.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: fixed
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Indicates whether the column takes part in horizontal grid scrolling or is anchored to a grid edge.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: fixedPosition
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the grid edge to which the column is anchored.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: format
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies a format for the values displayed in a column.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: formItem
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: The form item configuration object. Used only when the editing mode is "form".

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: groupCellTemplate
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies a custom template for the group cell of a grid column.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: groupIndex
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the index of a column when grid records are grouped by the values of this column.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: headerCellTemplate
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies a custom template for the header of a grid column.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: headerFilter
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies column-level options for filtering using a column header filter.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: dataSource
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the data source to be used for the header filter.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: groupInterval
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies how header filter values should be combined into groups.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: lookup
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies options of a lookup column.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: allowClearing
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies whether or not a user can nullify values of a lookup column.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: dataSource
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the data source providing data for a lookup column.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: displayExpr
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the expression defining the data source field whose values must be displayed.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: valueExpr
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the expression defining the data source field whose values must be replaced.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: name
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the identifier of the column.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: precision
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies a precision for formatted values displayed in a column.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: selectedFilterOperation
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies a filter operation applied to a column.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: setCellValue
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies a callback function to be invoked after the cell value is edited by an end-user and before the new value is saved to the data source.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: showEditorAlways
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies whether or not the column displays its values by using editors.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: showInColumnChooser
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies whether or not to display the header of a hidden column in the column chooser.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: showWhenGrouped
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies whether or not to display the column when grid records are grouped by it.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: sortIndex
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the index of a column when grid records are sorted by the values of this column.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: sortOrder
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the initial sort order of column values.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: trueText
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: In a boolean column, replaces all true items with a specified text.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: validationRules
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies an array of validation rules to be checked when updating column cell values.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: visible
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies whether a column is visible or not.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: visibleIndex
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the sequence number of the column in the grid.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: width
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies a column width in pixels or percentages.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: customizeColumns
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies a function that customizes grid columns after they are created.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: dataSource
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies a data source for the grid.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: editing
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Contains options that specify how grid content can be changed.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: allowAdding
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies whether or not new grid records can be added at runtime.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: allowDeleting
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies whether or not grid records can be deleted at runtime.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: allowUpdating
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies whether or not grid records can be edited at runtime.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: form
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: The form configuration object. Used only when the editing mode is "form".

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: mode
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies how grid values can be edited manually.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: texts
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Contains options that specify texts for editing-related grid controls.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: addRow
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies text for a hint that appears when a user hovers the mouse pointer over the "Add" button. Setting this option makes sense only when the allowAdding option is true.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: cancelAllChanges
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies text for a hint that appears when a user hovers the mouse pointer over the "Revert" button. Setting this option makes sense only when the editMode option is set to batch.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: cancelRowChanges
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies text for a cancel button displayed when a row is in the editing state. Setting this option makes sense only when the allowUpdating option is set to true.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: confirmDeleteMessage
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies a message to be displayed by a confirmation window. Setting this option makes sense only when the edit mode is "row".
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Default: "Are you sure you want to delete this record?"

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: confirmDeleteTitle
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies text to be displayed in the title of a confirmation window. Setting this option makes sense only when the edit mode is "row".

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: deleteRow
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies text for a button that deletes a row from a grid. Setting this option makes sense only when the allowDeleting option is set to true.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: editRow
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies text for a button that turns a row into the editing state. Setting this option makes sense only when the allowUpdating option is set to true.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: saveAllChanges
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies text for a hint that appears when a user hovers the mouse pointer over the "Save" button. Setting this option makes sense only when the editMode option is set to batch.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: saveRowChanges
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies text for a save button displayed when a row is in the editing state. Setting this option makes sense only when the allowUpdating option is set to true.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: undeleteRow
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies text for a button that recovers a deleted row. Setting this option makes sense only if the grid uses the batch edit mode and the allowDeleting option is set to true.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: validationCancelChanges
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies text for a hint that appears when a user hovers the mouse pointer over the "Cancel changes" button. Setting this option makes sense only when the editMode option is set to cell and the validation capabilities are enabled.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: errorRowEnabled
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Indicates whether to show the error row for the grid.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: export
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies options for exporting grid data.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: allowExportSelectedData
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Indicates whether to allow end users to export not only the data displayed in the grid, but the selected rows only.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: enabled
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Indicates if the export feature is enabled in the grid.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: excelFilterEnabled
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies whether to enable Excel filtering for the exported data in the resulting XLSX file.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: excelWrapTextEnabled
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies whether to enable word wrapping for the exported data in the resulting XLSX file.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: fileName
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies a default name for the file to which grid data is exported.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: proxyUrl
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the URL of the server-side proxy that streams the resulting file to the end user to enable export in IE8, IE9 and Safari browsers.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: texts
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Contains options that specify texts for the export-related commands and hints.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: excelFormat
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies text for the item in the Export dropdown menu that exports grid data to Excel.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: exportTo
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies text for the Export button when this button invokes a dropdown menu so you can choose the required export format.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: exportToExcel
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies text for the Export button's hint when this button exports to the XSLX format without invoking the drop-down menu.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: selectedRows
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies text for the option in the Export dropdown menu that allows you to choose whether to export all the grid data or the selected rows only.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: filterRow
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies filter row options.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: applyFilter
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies when to apply a filter.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: applyFilterText
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies text for the hint that pops up when a user hovers the mouse pointer over the "Apply Filter" button.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: betweenEndText
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies text for the range end in the 'between' filter type.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: betweenStartText
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies text for the range start in the 'between' filter type.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: operationDescriptions
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies descriptions for filter operations.
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Default: { "=": "Equals", "<>": "Does not equal", "<": "Less than", "<=": "Less than or equal to", ">": "Greater than", ">=": "Greater than or equal to", "startswith": "Starts with", "contains": "Contains", "notcontains": "Does not contain", "endswith": "Ends with", "between": "Between" }

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: resetOperationText
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies text for the reset operation in a filter list.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: showAllText
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies text for the operation of clearing the applied filter when a select box is used.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: showOperationChooser
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies whether or not an icon that allows the user to choose a filter operation is visible.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: visible
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies whether the filter row is visible or not.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: grouping
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the behavior of grouped grid records.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: allowCollapsing
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies whether the user can collapse grouped records in a grid or not.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: autoExpandAll
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies whether groups appear expanded or not.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: groupContinuedMessage
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the message displayed in a group row when the corresponding group is continued from the previous page.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: groupContinuesMessage
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the message displayed in a group row when the corresponding group continues on the next page.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: groupPanel
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies options that configure the group panel.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: allowColumnDragging
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies whether columns can be dragged onto or from the group panel.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: emptyPanelText
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies text displayed by the group panel when it does not contain any columns.
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Default: "Drag a column header here to group by that column"

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: visible
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies whether the group panel is visible or not.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: headerFilter
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies options for filtering using a column header filter.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: height
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the height of the dropdown menu invoked when using a column header filter.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: texts
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Contains options that specify texts for the dropdown menu invoked when you use a column header filter.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: cancel
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies text for a button that closes the column header filter's dropdown menu without applying performed selection.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: emptyValue
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies text for the item specifying an empty value in the column header filter's dropdown menu.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: ok
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies text for a button that closes the column header filter's dropdown menu and applies specified filtering.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: visible
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Indicates whether or not the column header filter button is visible.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: width
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the width of the dropdown menu invoked when using a column header filter.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: loadPanel
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies options configuring the load panel.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: enabled
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies whether to show the load panel or not.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: height
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the height of the load panel in pixels.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: indicatorSrc
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies a URL pointing to an image to be used as a loading indicator.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: showIndicator
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies whether or not a loading indicator must be displayed on the load panel.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: showPane
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies whether or not the pane of the load panel must be displayed.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: text
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies text displayed by the load panel.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: width
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the width of the load panel in pixels.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: masterDetail
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Allows you to build a master-detail interface in the grid.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: autoExpandAll
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies whether detail sections appear expanded or collapsed.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: enabled
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Enables an end-user to expand/collapse detail sections.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: template
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the template for detail sections.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: noDataText
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies text displayed when a grid does not contain any records.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: onCellClick
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: A handler for the cellClick event.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: onCellHoverChanged
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: A handler for the cellHoverChanged event.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: onCellPrepared
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: A handler for the cellPrepared event.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: onContextMenuPreparing
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: A handler for the contextMenuPreparing event.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: onDataErrorOccurred
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: A handler for the dataErrorOccured event.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: onEditingStart
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: A handler for the editingStart event.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: onEditorPrepared
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: A handler for the editorPrepared event.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: onEditorPreparing
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: A handler for the editorPreparing event.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: onExported
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: A handler for the exported event.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: onExporting
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: A handler for the exporting event.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: onFileSaving
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: A handler for the fileSaving event.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: onInitNewRow
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: A handler for the initNewRow event.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: onKeyDown
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: A handler for the keyDown event.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: onRowClick
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: A handler for the rowClick event.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: onRowCollapsed
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: A handler for the rowCollapsed event.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: onRowCollapsing
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: A handler for the rowCollapsing event.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: onRowExpanded
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: A handler for the rowExpanded event.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: onRowExpanding
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: A handler for the rowExpanding event.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: onRowInserted
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: A handler for the rowInserted event.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: onRowInserting
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: A handler for the rowInserting event.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: onRowPrepared
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: A handler for the rowPrepared event.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: onRowRemoved
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: A handler for the rowRemoved event.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: onRowRemoving
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: A handler for the rowRemoving event.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: onRowUpdated
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: A handler for the rowUpdated event.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: onRowUpdating
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: A handler for the rowUpdating event.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: onRowValidating
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: A handler for the rowValidating event.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: onSelectionChanged
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: A handler for the selectionChanged event.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: pager
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the options of a grid pager.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: allowedPageSizes
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the page sizes that can be selected at runtime.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: infoText
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the text accompanying the page navigator.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: showInfo
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies whether or not to display the text accompanying the page navigator. This text is specified by the infoText option.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: showNavigationButtons
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies whether or not to display buttons that switch the grid to the previous or next page.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: showPageSizeSelector
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies whether to show the page size selector or not.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: visible
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies whether to show the pager or not.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: paging
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies paging options.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: enabled
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies whether dxDataGrid loads data page by page or all at once.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: pageIndex
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the grid page that should be displayed by default.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: pageSize
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the size of grid pages.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: remoteOperations
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the operations that must be performed on the server side.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: filtering
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies whether or not filtering must be performed on the server side.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: grouping
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies whether or not grouping must be performed on the server side.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: paging
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies whether or not paging must be performed on the server side.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: sorting
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies whether or not sorting must be performed on the server side.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: summary
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies whether or not summaries calculation must be performed on the server side.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: rowAlternationEnabled
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies whether or not grid rows must be shaded in a different way.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: rowTemplate
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies a custom template for grid rows.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: scrolling
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: A configuration object specifying scrolling options.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: mode
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the scrolling mode.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: preloadEnabled
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies whether or not a grid must preload pages adjacent to the current page when using virtual scrolling.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: scrollByContent
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies whether or not the scrolling by content is enabled.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: scrollByThumb
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies whether or not the scrollbar thumb scrolling enabled.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: showScrollbar
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the scrollbar display policy.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: useNative
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies whether or not the widget uses native scrolling.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: searchPanel
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies options of the search panel.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: highlightSearchText
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies whether or not search strings in the located grid records should be highlighted.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: placeholder
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies text displayed by the search panel when no search string was typed.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: text
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Sets a search string for the search panel.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: visible
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies whether the search panel is visible or not.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: width
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the width of the search panel in pixels.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: selectedRowKeys
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the keys of the records that must appear selected initially.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: selection
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies options of runtime selection.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: allowSelectAll
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies whether the user can select all grid records at once.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: mode
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the selection mode.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: showCheckBoxesMode
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the checkbox row display policy in the multiple mode.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: showBorders
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies whether the outer borders of the grid are visible or not.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: showColumnHeaders
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies whether column headers are visible or not.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: showColumnLines
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies whether or not vertical lines separating one grid column from another are visible.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: showRowLines
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies whether or not horizontal lines separating one grid row from another are visible.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: sortByGroupSummaryInfo
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Allows you to sort groups according to the values of group summary items.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: groupColumn
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the identifier of the column that must be used in grouping so that sorting by group summary item values be applied.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: sortOrder
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the sort order of group summary item values.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: summaryItem
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the group summary item whose values must be used to sort groups.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: sorting
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies options of runtime sorting.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: ascendingText
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies text for the context menu item that sets an ascending sort order in a column.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: clearText
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies text for the context menu item that resets sorting settings for a column.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: descendingText
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies text for the context menu item that sets a descending sort order in a column.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: type

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: showInColumn

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: showInGroupFooter

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: skipEmptyValues
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies whether or not to skip empty strings, null and undefined values when calculating a summary.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the angle used to rotate point labels from their initial position.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: showForZeroValues

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: verticalOffset
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies how to shift point labels vertically from their initial positions.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: visible
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the visibility of point labels.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: lowValueField

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: maxLabelCount
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies how many points are acceptable to be in a series to display all labels for these points. Otherwise, the labels will not be displayed.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: minBarSize
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the minimal height (length, if the chart is rotated) of a displayed bar in pixels.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: opacity
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies opacity for a series.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: openValueField

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the pane that will be used to display a series.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: opacity

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: valueType
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the desired type of axis values.

IntellisenseObjectInfo.Description: A widget that allows end users to select a range of values on a scale.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: A handler for the disposing event.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: A handler for the initialized event.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: A handler for the optionChanged event.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: rtlEnabled
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies whether or not the widget supports right-to-left representation.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: onDrawn
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: A handler for the drawn event.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: onIncidentOccurred
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: A handler for the incidentOccurred event.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: pathModified
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Notifies a widget that it is embedded into an HTML page that uses a path modifier.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: theme
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Sets the name of the theme to be used in the widget.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: background
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the options for the range selector's background.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: color
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the background color for the dxRangeSelector.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: image
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies image options.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: location
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies a location for the image in the background of a range selector.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: url
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the image's URL.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: visible
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Indicates whether or not the background (background color and/or image) is visible.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: behavior
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the dxRangeSelector's behavior options.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: allowSlidersSwap
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Indicates whether or not you can swap sliders.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: animationEnabled
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Indicates whether or not animation is enabled.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: callSelectedRangeChanged
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies when to call the onSelectedRangeChanged function.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: manualRangeSelectionEnabled
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Indicates whether or not an end user can specify the range using a mouse, without the use of sliders.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: moveSelectedRangeByClick
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Indicates whether or not an end user can shift the selected range to the required location on a scale by clicking.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: snapToTicks
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Indicates whether to snap a slider to ticks.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: chart
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the options required to display a chart as the range selector's background.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: barWidth
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies a common bar width as a percentage from 0 to 1.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: bottomIndent
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies a coefficient for determining an indent from the bottom background boundary to the lowest chart point.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: commonSeriesSettings
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: An object defining the common configuration options for the chart’s series.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: dataPrepareSettings
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: An object providing options for managing data from a data source.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: checkTypeForAllData
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies whether or not to validate values from a data source.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: convertToAxisDataType
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies whether or not to convert the values from a data source into the data type of an axis.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: sortingMethod
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies how to sort series points.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: equalBarWidth
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies whether all bars in a series must have the same width, or may have different widths if any points in other series are missing.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: negativesAsZeroes
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Forces the widget to treat negative values as zeroes. Applies to stacked-like series only.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: palette
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Sets the name of the palette to be used in the range selector's chart. Alternatively, an array of colors can be set as a custom palette to be used within this chart.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: series
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: An object defining the chart’s series.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: seriesTemplate
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Defines options for the series template.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: customizeSeries
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies a callback function that returns a series object with individual series settings.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: nameField
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies a data source field that represents the series name.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: topIndent
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies a coefficient for determining an indent from the background's top boundary to the topmost chart point.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: useAggregation
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies whether or not to filter the series points depending on their quantity.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: valueAxis
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies options for the chart's value axis.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: inverted
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Indicates whether or not the chart's value axis must be inverted.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: logarithmBase
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the value to be raised to a power when generating ticks for a logarithmic value axis.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: max
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the maximum value of the chart's value axis.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: min
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the minimum value of the chart's value axis.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: type
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the type of the value axis.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: valueType
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the desired type of axis values.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: containerBackgroundColor
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the color of the parent page element.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: dataSource
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies a data source for the scale values and for the chart at the background.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: dataSourceField
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the data source field that provides data for the scale.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Range selector's indent options.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies range selector's left indent.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies a text to be displayed by the loading indicator.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the blank space in pixels between the dxRangeSelector widget's extreme elements and the boundaries of the area provided for the widget (see size).

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: bottom
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the blank space in pixels between the dxRangeSelector widget's extreme elements at the bottom and the bottom boundary of the area provided for the widget (see size).

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: left
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the blank space in pixels between the dxRangeSelector widget's extreme elements on the left side and the left boundary of the area provided for the widget (see size).

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: right
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the blank space in pixels between the dxRangeSelector widget's extreme elements on the right side and the right boundary of the area provided for the widget (see size).

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: top
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the blank space in pixels between the dxRangeSelector widget's extreme elements at the top and the top boundary of the area provided for the widget (see size).

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Sets a color for the bars indicating positive values. Available for a sparkline of the bar type only.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies a data source for the sparkline.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Sets a color for the boundary of both the first and last points on a sparkline.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: ignoreEmptyPoints
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies whether a sparkline ignores null data points or not.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Sets a color for a line on a sparkline. Available for the sparklines of the line- and area-like types.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: lineWidth
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies a width for a line on a sparkline. Available for the sparklines of the line- and area-like types.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: lossColor
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Sets a color for the bars indicating the values that are less than the winloss threshold. Available for a sparkline of the winloss type only.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: maxColor
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Sets a color for the boundary of the maximum point on a sparkline.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: maxValue
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the maximum value of the sparkline's value axis.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: minColor
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Sets a color for the boundary of the minimum point on a sparkline.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: minValue
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the minimum value of the sparkline value axis.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: pointColor
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Sets a color for points on a sparkline. Available for the sparklines of the line- and area-like types.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: pointSize
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the diameter of sparkline points in pixels. Available for the sparklines of line- and area-like types.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: pointSymbol
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies a symbol to use as a point marker on a sparkline. Available for the sparklines of the line- and area-like types.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: showFirstLast
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies whether or not to indicate both the first and last values on a sparkline.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: showMinMax
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies whether or not to indicate both the minimum and maximum values on a sparkline.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Determines the type of a sparkline.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: valueField
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the data source field that provides values for a sparkline.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: winColor
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Sets a color for the bars indicating the values greater than a winloss threshold. Available for a sparkline of the winloss type only.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: winlossThreshold
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies a value that serves as a threshold for the sparkline of the winloss type.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies a font weight for marker labels.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: maxSize
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the pixel-measured diameter of the marker that represents the biggest value. Setting this option makes sense only if the layer type is "marker".

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: minSize
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the pixel-measured diameter of the marker that represents the smallest value. Setting this option makes sense only if the layer type is "marker".

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: name
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the layer name.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: opacity
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the layer opacity (from 0 to 1).

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: palette
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the name of the palette or a custom range of colors to be used for coloring a layer.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: paletteSize
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the number of colors in a palette.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: selectedBorderColor
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies a color for the border of the layer element when it is selected.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: selectedBorderWidth
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies a pixel-measured line width (for layers of a line type) or width for the border of the layer element when it is selected.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: selectedColor
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies a color for the layer element when it is selected.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: selectionMode
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies whether single or multiple map elements can be selected on a vector map.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: size
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the size of markers. Setting this option makes sense only if the layer type is "marker" and the elementType is "dot", "pie" or "image".

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: sizeGroupingField
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the field that provides data to be used for sizing bubble markers. Setting this option makes sense only if the layer type is "marker" and the elementType is "bubble".

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: sizeGroups
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Allows you to display bubbles with similar attributes in the same size. Setting this option makes sense only if the layer type is "marker" and the elementType is "bubble".

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: type
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies layer type.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: legends
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Configures map legends.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: backgroundColor
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the color of the legend's background.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: border
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies legend border settings.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: color
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the color of the legend border.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: cornerRadius
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies a radius for the corners of the legend border.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: dashStyle
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the dash style of the legend border.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: opacity
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the opacity of the legend border.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: visible
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies whether the legend border is visible or not.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: width
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the width of the legend border in pixels.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: columnCount
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies how many columns must be taken to arrange legend items.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: columnItemSpacing
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the spacing between a pair of neighboring legend columns in pixels.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: customizeHint
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies text for a hint that appears when a user hovers the mouse pointer over the text of a legend item.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: customizeText
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies text for legend items.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: font
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies font options for legend items.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: color
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the font color of legend items.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: family
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the font family of legend items.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: opacity
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the font opacity of legend items.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: size
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the font size of legend items.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: weight
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the font weight of legend items.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: horizontalAlignment
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the legend's position on the map.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: itemsAlignment
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the alignment of legend items.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: itemTextPosition
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the position of text relative to the item marker.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: margin
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the distance between the legend and the container borders in pixels.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: bottom
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the legend's bottom margin in pixels.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: left
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the legend's left margin in pixels.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: right
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the legend's right margin in pixels.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: top
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the legend's bottom margin in pixels.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: markerColor
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the color of item markers in the legend. The specified color applied only when the legend uses 'size' source.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: markerSize
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the size of item markers in the legend in pixels.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: orientation
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies whether to arrange legend items horizontally or vertically.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: paddingLeftRight
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the spacing between the legend left/right border and legend items in pixels.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: paddingTopBottom
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the spacing between the legend top/bottom border and legend items in pixels.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: rowCount
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies how many rows must be taken to arrange legend items.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: rowItemSpacing
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the spacing between a pair of neighboring legend rows in pixels.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: source
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the source of data for the legend.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: grouping
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the type of the legend grouping.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: layer
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies a layer to which the legend belongs.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: verticalAlignment
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the legend's position on the map.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: visible
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies whether or not the legend is visible on the map.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: loadingIndicator
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the appearance of the loading indicator.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: backgroundColor
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies a color for the loading indicator background.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: font
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies font options for the loading indicator text.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: color
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies a color for the loading indicator text.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: family
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies a font family for the loading indicator text.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: opacity
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies a font opacity for the loading indicator text.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: size
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies a font size for the loading indicator text.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: weight
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies a font weight for the loading indicator text.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: show
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies whether to show the loading indicator or not.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: text
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies a text to be displayed by the loading indicator.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: maxZoomFactor
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies a map's maximum zoom factor.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: onCenterChanged
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: A handler for the centerChanged event.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: onClick
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: A handler for the click event.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: onSelectionChanged
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: A handler for the selectionChanged event.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: onTooltipHidden
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: A handler for the tooltipHidden event.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: onTooltipShown
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: A handler for the tooltipShown event.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: onZoomFactorChanged
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: A handler for the zoomFactorChanged event.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: panningEnabled
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Disables the panning capability.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: projection
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the map projection.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: size
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the size of the dxVectorMap widget.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: height
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the height of the widget.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: width
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the width of the widget.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: title
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies a title for the vector map.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: font
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies font options for the title.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: color
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies a font color for the title.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: family
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies a font family for the title.
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Default: "'Segoe UI Light', 'Helvetica Neue Light', 'Trebuchet MS', Verdana"

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: opacity
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies font opacity for the title.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: size
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies font size for the title.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: weight
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies font weight for the title.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: horizontalAlignment
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the widget title's horizontal position.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: margin
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the distance between the title and surrounding widget elements in pixels.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: bottom
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the distance in pixels between the bottom side of the title and the surrounding widget elements.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: left
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the distance in pixels between the left side of the title and the surrounding widget elements.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: right
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the distance between the right side of the title and surrounding widget elements in pixels.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: top
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the distance between the top side of the title and surrounding widget elements in pixels.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: placeholderSize
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the height of the space reserved for the title.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: subtitle
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies a subtitle for the widget.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: font
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies font options for the subtitle.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: color
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies font color for the subtitle.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: family
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies a font family for the subtitle.
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Default: "'Segoe UI Light', 'Helvetica Neue Light', 'Trebuchet MS', Verdana"

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: opacity
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies font opacity for the subtitle.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: size
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies font size for the subtitle.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: weight
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies font weight for the subtitle.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: text
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies text for the subtitle.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: text
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies text for the title.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: verticalAlignment
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the widget title's position in the vertical direction.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: tooltip
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies tooltip options.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: arrowLength
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the length of the tooltip's arrow in pixels.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: border
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the appearance of the tooltip's border.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: color
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the color of the tooltip's border.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: dashStyle
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the dash style of the tooltip's border.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: opacity
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the opacity of the tooltip's border.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: visible
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies whether the tooltip's border is visible or not.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: width
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the width of the tooltip's border in pixels.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: color
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies a color for the tooltip.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: container
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the container to draw tooltips inside of it.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: customizeTooltip
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies text and appearance of a set of tooltips.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: enabled
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies whether or not the tooltip is enabled.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: font
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies font options for the text displayed by the tooltip.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: color
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies a font color for the text displayed by the tooltip.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: family
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies a font family for the text displayed by the tooltip.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: opacity
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies a font opacity for the text displayed by the tooltip.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: size
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies a font size for the text displayed by the tooltip.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: weight
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies a font weight for the text displayed by the tooltip.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: opacity
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the opacity of a tooltip.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: paddingLeftRight
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies a distance from the tooltip's left/right boundaries to the inner text in pixels.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: paddingTopBottom
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies a distance from the tooltip's top/bottom boundaries to the inner text in pixels.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: shadow
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies options of the tooltip's shadow.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: blur
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the blur distance of the tooltip's shadow.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: color
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the color of the tooltip's shadow.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: offsetX
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the horizontal offset of the tooltip's shadow relative to the tooltip in pixels.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: offsetY
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the vertical offset of the tooltip's shadow relative to the tooltip in pixels.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: opacity
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the opacity of the tooltip's shadow.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: zIndex
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the z-index for tooltips.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: touchEnabled
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies whether the map should respond to touch gestures.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: wheelEnabled
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies whether or not the map should respond when a user rolls the mouse wheel.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: zoomFactor
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies a number that is used to zoom a map initially.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: zoomingEnabled
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Disables the zooming capability.
